meaning_str.bing:
n. 伤害；损害
v. 伤害；损害
网络. 危害；害处；损伤

伤害；损害；危害；坏处；损失；不良后果；不利影响；负面效应
伤害；损害；危害；损伤；损害…的健康；对…的健康不利

1.en: Being tired all the time is often put down to anaemia and women think they should take more iron, but that could do more harm than good.
1.cn: 女人总将长时间的疲劳归因于贫血，自以为多摄入点铁元素就没事了，但是这样做弊多利少。

2.en: Doing so did not harm my health; on the contrary, it improved the well being of my hair in general and made me feel great!
2.cn: 这样做不仅不影响健康，相反，还从整体上改善了头发状况，让我感觉好极了！

3.en: The children don't do much at their youth club, but at least they stay out of harm's way.
3.cn: 孩子们在青年俱乐部没有什么大的业绩，但至少是平平安安的。

0.en: And what is the harm in that, Mrs. Lockhart?
0.cn: 这样做有什么损害，洛克哈特女士？

1.en: I swear, no harm will come to you as long as I live.
1.cn: 我发誓，只要我活着的一天，你不会受到任何伤害。

2.en: That will do him a lot of harm. Well, what would you prefer?
2.cn: 那对他会很不利。那你想我怎么样？

3.en: Second, never harm another Glader. None of this works unless we have trust.
3.cn: 第二，永远不要伤害同伴，我们必须彼此信任。

4.en: Still, many of our men and women in uniform will spend this Christmas in harm's way.
4.cn: 但仍然有很多的男女军人要在危险地区度过这个圣诞节。

5.en: What if we didn't have the money and advantages we do? What if they were in harm's way?
5.cn: 如果我们既没钱也没地位呢？如果他们遭灾了呢？

6.en: And I told my wife, "Don't worry. They're fighting in the city. We are miles from harm."
6.cn: 我告诉我妻子“不用担心，他们在城里打仗我们离得远呢，不会有事。”

7.en: Well, I mean I guess there is no harm in putting my name down. I'm gonna do it too. Me too.
7.cn: 先预约的确不会怎样。我也要预约。我也要。

8.en: We mean no harm. We saw your island across the sea, and we thought, "Wonder what they're up to."
8.cn: 我们没有恶意，我们从大海从那头，看到你们的小岛，心想他们在干什么呢？

9.en: Well, it's better than hunting them down. Yeah, why not? If it fails, no harm done anyway, right?
9.cn: 总比被动地找他们要好，可以试试，就算失败，也没什么坏处。

10.en: The harm is that this is a Trojan horse hearing. The ASA does not care about the source of funds.
10.cn: 损害就是这是"特洛伊木马"听证会，助理检察官根本不关心资金来源。

11.en: You thought you put him in the hospital, take him out of harm's way. The same thing you tried to do.
11.cn: 你本想让总理受伤住院，以此来救他一命。就像你打算做的那样。

12.en: You'd be helping yourself, Tom. And if that helps us a little bit along the way, what's the harm in that?
12.cn: 你是帮你自己，汤姆，如果顺便帮助了我们，又有何不可呢？

13.en: So now we assist our allies, in solving human conflicts. To prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
13.cn: 现在我们帮助盟军，解决人类的冲突，防止人类伤害自己。

14.en: Yes, as impossible as it seems, the sloth has natural enemies that would like to harm or otherwise kill us.
14.cn: 是的，表面看来虽然不可能，树懒有天敌可能伤害我们，甚至“杀死”我们。

15.en: There will always be those who mean to do us harm. To stop them, we risk awakening the same evil within ourselves.
15.cn: 总有人想来伤害我们，为了阻止他们，我们自己也变成了恶魔。

16.en: Great Khan, please! Lower your eyes when you speak to the Khan of Khans! I never meant to harm you! No! Only my beloved!
16.cn: 大汗，求您了！休得在和众汗之汗说话时直视大汗！我无意伤害您。不，你只是想伤害我所爱之人！

17.en: That's true. Have you ever harmed a human being or through inaction allowed a human being to come to harm? Of course not.
17.cn: 就是啊，你伤害过人类吗？或任人受伤而袖手旁观？当然没有。

18.en: Skipping one day of school isn't gonna do any harm. I ditched plenty, and look at me today. I am fielding multiple job offers.
18.cn: 逃一天课不会怎么样的。我就逃了很多课，看看我现在，我得到了很多工作机会。

19.en: Not necessarily. Many argue the essence of a Mexican standoff is that no one can walk away from the conflict without incurring harm.
19.cn: 不一定，很多人争论"墨西哥对峙"的本质在于就是没人能够全身而退却毫发无伤。
